attributes.action: Increased sentences for those prosecuted by the Animal Welfare Act 2006
attributes.additional_details: Evidence - RSPCA and Police on Twitter.
attributes.background: Owner filmed dogs ripping a cat apart for his own ‘fun’ gets a dispicable 22 weeks and a £490 fine. The footage was so horrific the judge had the leave court. Crimes against animals do not carry tough enough sentences. This type of sickening behaviour requires urgent action. We can, and must do more
